orthogroups.name: Photosystem II protein D1
orthogroups.description: Core protein of photosystem II, responsible for the primary light-dependent charge separation in photosynthesis.

orthogroups.name: Rubisco large subunit
orthogroups.description: Large subunit of ribulose-1,5-bisphosphate carboxylase/oxygenase (Rubisco), the key enzyme in photosynthetic carbon fixation.

orthogroups.name: Heat shock protein 70
orthogroups.description: Molecular chaperone that assists in protein folding and protects cells from heat stress.

orthogroups.name: Phytochrome B
orthogroups.description: Light-sensitive receptor involved in red/far-red light perception and regulation of plant development.

orthogroups.name: MADS-box transcription factor
orthogroups.description: Transcription factor family involved in flower development and other developmental processes.
